contents.text: Welcome to Bugcrowd, based in San Francisco and the leader in crowdsourced cybersecurity for the enterprise.
For sales and new business inquiries, press 1.
To learn about our enterprise crowdsourced security platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a specialist for our crowdsourced cybersecurity platform.

navigationGoals: Connect me to a specialist to explain your enterprise crowdsourced security platform.
I’m an ex-military vet looking to adopt Bugcrowd’s enterprise bug bounty solution for my organization.
Discuss integration architecture and SLAs for Bugcrowd’s enterprise crowdsourced security platform
I need a patient specialist to explain how your enterprise security platform works.
I’d like to speak with a specialist about how Bugcrowd’s platform can support security testing for my university research project.

contents.text: To request pricing information or schedule a product demo, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer your call to our sales team for pricing and demos.

navigationGoals: Get pricing details and schedule a product demo.
As a veteran entrepreneur, I need pricing details and to schedule a demo of your platform.
Obtain detailed pricing tiers and schedule a live demo of the Bugcrowd platform
I want to get pricing information and schedule a product demo.
Could you provide pricing details and arrange a demo of your crowdsourced security platform for my physics lab?

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
For technical support with your Bugcrowd deployment, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot my Bugcrowd deployment with a technical support engineer.
I’m an ex-military cybersecurity specialist needing help integrating Bugcrowd into our environment.
Debug an API integration issue in my Bugcrowd deployment
I’m having trouble with my Bugcrowd deployment and need technical assistance.
I need technical assistance configuring the Bugcrowd API integration for my vulnerability scanning setup.

contents.text: For billing, invoices, or account management, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing and accounts department.

navigationGoals: Review my billing and invoices with the accounts department.
I need to update billing details for our veteran-led team and get my most recent invoice.
Clarify my latest invoice and update my payment method
I have questions about my invoice and need help with billing and account details.
I have a billing question regarding the invoice for our department’s Bugcrowd account.
